page.title: 09LOCAL AMENITIES - Parks
page.content: BURE PARK, GT. YARMOUTH Mr.Terry Whitwell and his assistant Janice, who work for Yarmouth Borough Council,came to the school to tell us about the Park. They told us that Bure Park,as it is now, is two years old, and owned by the Borough Council.It was opened by Gordon Chapman,the then Mayor of Gt.Yarmouth. It is used mainly by local people, and some holidaymakers. The open part of the park can be freely used for any activity. Future plans include provision of a permanent campsite. He told us that an unconfirmed story says that a circus elephant was once buried there. The grounds were reclaimed from allotments and a waste tip.
